Name: Timberbits
Description:
Adds tim hortons tim(ber)bits to both the Folktails and the IronTeeth.

Timbits are a bite-sized dough confection sold at the Canadian-based franchise Tim Hortons.
Timbits are equivalent to the American 'donut hole', however they are baked, rather than fried.

The Folktails can produce them in the bakery, using 4 wheat flour and 2 maple syrup.
The IronTeeth can produce them in the food factory using 1 canola oil and 3 berries.
